name: 예리한 눈썰미
text:
[free] 자원을 2개 소비합니다: 당신은 이번 단계가 끝날 때까지 +1 [intellect]을 얻습니다.
[free] 자원을 2개 소비합니다: 당신은 이번 단계가 끝날 때까지 +1 [combat]을 얻습니다.

name: 광휘의 강타
text: Fight. You may use [willpower] instead of [combat] for this attack. When you initiate this attack, search the chaos bag for up to 3 [bless] tokens, and seal them here. For each [bless] token sealed on Radiant Smite, you get +1 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack. If this attack defeats the attacked enemy, return the sealed tokens to the token pool. Otherwise, release them.

name: 진실이 손짓한다
text: Play only if you are not engaged with an enemy. Move. Choose an unrevealed location. Move (one location at a time) along the shortest path toward that location, until you enter that location. End this effect if you reveal a location, if an enemy engages you, or if your movement is blocked.

name: 오우락쉬의 시선
text: Reveal 7 random chaos tokens from the chaos bag. Deal a total of 1 damage plus 1 additional damage for each [curse] or [auto_fail] token revealed, divided as you choose among enemies at your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: 두 가지 신앙을 섬기는 사제
text: [reaction] After Priest of Two Faiths enters play: Add 3 [bless] tokens to the chaos bag. Forced - At the end of the upkeep phase: You must either add 1 [curse] token to the chaos bag or discard Priest of Two Faiths.

name: 요시찰
text: Attach to your location. Limit 1 per location. Forced - After a non-[[Elite]] enemy enters attached location, discard Under Surveillance: Automatically evade that enemy and discover 1 clue at attached location. That enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase.

name: 피의 계약
text:
[free] '피의 계약'에 파멸을 1개 추가합니다: 당신은 이번 능력 테스트에서 +2 [willpower]를 얻습니다. (테스트당 1번 한정.)
[free] '피의 계약'에 파멸을 1개 추가합니다: 당신은 이번 능력 테스트에서 +2 [combat]을 얻습니다. (테스트당 1번 한정.)

name: 심연의 서
text: [action] Exhaust Abyssal Tome: Fight. You may use either [intellect] or [willpower] for this attack, instead of [combat]. When you initiate this attack, you may place 1 doom on Abyssal Tome (to a maximum of 3). You get +1 skill value and deal +1 damage for this attack for each doom on Abyssal Tome.

name: 나비 효과
text: Fast. Play when a chaos token with a symbol is revealed during a skill test at your location (before resolving its effects). You or the performing investigator may either commit a card to this skill test, or return a card they committed to this test to their hand.

name: 삼세판
text:
Fast. Play when a skill test at your location begins.
Twice during this test, when an investigator reveals a chaos token, they may cancel it, return it to the chaos bag, and reveal a new chaos token.

name: 운명 조작
text:
Reveal tokens from the chaos bag until you reveal a [curse], [auto_fail], [bless], or [elder_sign] token. If you revealed...
- ...a [curse] or [auto_fail] token, deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location.
- ...a [bless] or [elder_sign] token, heal 2 damage from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset at your location.
This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
